description: Number of trees of subsets of an n-set.
references: F. R. McMorris and T. Zaslavsky, The number of cladistic characters, Math. Biosciences, 54 (1981), 3-10.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Simon Plouffe, Approximations de séries génératrices et quelques conjectures, Dissertation, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
Simon Plouffe, 1031 Generating Functions and Conjectures, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
Index entries for sequences related to trees
formula: G.f.: x ( 1 + 6 x ) / ( 1 - x ) ( 1 - 2 x ) ( 1 - 3 x ).First differences give A003063, 3^(n-1)-2^n.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Feb 06 2001
